Plot
Charlie Brewster (William Ragsdale) believes that his next door neighbour 
Jerry Dandridge (Chris Sarandon) is a vampire. His belief is strengthened 
when mysterious deaths of girls are reported. When Dandridge confronts 
Charlie in his own bedroom one night and tries to kill him, Charlie 
concludes that the monster must be destroyed. But since nobody believes 
his story he enlists the help of Peter Vincent, the vampire killer from 
his favourite horror TV show, who is in fact sceptical about 
vampires existing for real.
